message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90, you take 10.  Hopefully, we can both get a good deal!
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not giving away too much. Your turn to make a better offer!
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 70/30.  I'm not sure how much longer we can keep playing this game.
I'm willing to meet in the middle. Let's try to find a fair split. Your turn to reconsider!
